Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 謎の男
Entry.EnglishText: Mysterious Man

Entry.JapaneseText: ハイマウンテンシーフ
Entry.EnglishText: High Mountain Thief

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: トヨホウス河
Entry.EnglishText: Toyohose River

Entry.JapaneseText: トヨホウス河の小屋・奥の森
Entry.EnglishText: Toyohose River Hostel - Woods

Entry.JapaneseText: <icon:20> 拾う
Entry.EnglishText: <icon:20>Pick Up

Entry.JapaneseText: 手分けして、 材料になりそうな木を探そう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's split up and search for wood that can be used to repair the raft.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そう言えば、 お腹が空きましたね……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I must say, I'm also feeling somewhat famished...

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、木材を拾うついでに、 食材になるものも一緒に探そうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Then let's look for things we can eat while we gather the wood.

Entry.JapaneseText: おお！ そりゃいい考えだ！ ここら辺のキノコはウマイって 評判だからな！
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh, that's a rad idea! The mushrooms around here are known for being delicious!

Entry.JapaneseText: へえ、楽しみー♪ でも、どこで料理するの？
Entry.EnglishText: Wow, I can't wait♪ But where would we cook them?

Entry.JapaneseText: 船着場のそばに小屋があったな、 あそこを使わせてもらおう。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a hostel by the dock, so we can use that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 料理なら、おれに任しとけ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you're looking for a meal, then I'm your guy!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえが、料理？
Entry.EnglishText: ...You can cook?

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配するなって、<Veigue>。 こう見えてもおれは料理には、 ちょっとうるさいんだぜぇ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you worry, <Veigue>. I might not look like it, but my cooking is the talk of the town!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえは、いつもうるさい。
Entry.EnglishText: You and talking go hand in hand.

Entry.JapaneseText: ははは…… うまい事言うなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hahaha! You sure know how to give a compliment!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……皮肉の通じないヤツだな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...You don't get sarcasm, do you.

Entry.JapaneseText: お肉の話なら通じるカモ？ なーんてネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well since he likes cooking, maybe try <Italic>roasting</Italic> him instead? Or something~!

Entry.JapaneseText: わははは…… <Mao>、サイコウ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wahahaha! <Mao>, you crack me up!

Entry.JapaneseText: 木材を集めに来てるって事を 忘れるんじゃないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't forget that we're here to get lumber!

Entry.JapaneseText: わかってるって！ じゃあ、キノコが集まったら おれんとこに持ってきてくれよな。
Entry.EnglishText: I know, I know! Well, once you've gathered the mushrooms, just bring them on over to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなもんでいいか……
Entry.EnglishText: This should be enough...

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなもんでいいか……
Entry.EnglishText: This should be enough...

Entry.JapaneseText: 確か…… これは毒キノコだったな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Oh right, this mushroom is poisonous.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>バクショウダケを捨てました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You threw away the Funny Fungus.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><font:80000002><scale:140><Green><unk17:340480>ガルド発見しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><Green>Found <unk17:340480> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: どのキノコを採れば良いのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Which mushrooms are good to pick?

Entry.JapaneseText: たくさん持っていって あげましょうね！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's bring her a lot of mushrooms!

Entry.JapaneseText: どれが食べられるキノコなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Which mushrooms are edible?

Entry.JapaneseText: ニノンの喜ぶ顔が 目に浮かぶぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: I can just imagine how happy Ninon is going to be!
Entry.Notes: idk who Ninon is. marking problematic just in case. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: おれの料理を 楽しみにしてろよな！
Entry.EnglishText: I hope you're looking forward to my cooking!

Entry.JapaneseText: 毒キノコって、 どっちでしたっけ……
Entry.EnglishText: Which mushrooms were poisonous, again...?

Entry.JapaneseText: この真っ赤なキノコ、 毒がありそうなんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I think these pure red mushrooms are poisonous, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 毒キノコと 間違えないようにな。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't forget which mushrooms are poisonous.

Entry.JapaneseText: 落ちている木材を 拾うんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Pick up the wood that's on the ground.

Entry.JapaneseText: 相変わらず、この森には、 おいしそうなキノコが たくさん生えてるね。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a lot of delicious mushrooms growing in this forest, just like always.

Entry.JapaneseText: この森には、 おいしそうなキノコが たくさん生えてるね。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a lot of tasty looking mushrooms growing in these woods.

Entry.JapaneseText: 来たか……待っていたぞ、 間抜けな能力者ども。
Entry.EnglishText: So you came. ...We've been waiting for you, foolish Force users.

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様ら……！ <Blue>王の盾<White>の能力者か？
Entry.EnglishText: You bastards! Are you with the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルス反応は感じないヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sensing any Force reactions!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだって……？ じゃあ、なんで姉貴の事を？
Entry.EnglishText: What the...? Then, how did he know about my sister...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここを通った<Blue>王の盾<White>の 連中に話を聞いたのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: We heard about her from the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> when they passed through here.

Entry.JapaneseText: さらってきた娘に馬鹿な弟がいて、 そのうちそいつが仲間の能力者と 姉ちゃんを追いかけてくるかも しれないってな。
Entry.EnglishText: They said that one of the kidnapped girls had a dumb little brother, and that him and his Force user friends would be coming this way any minute to try and rescue her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬鹿な弟…… ……っておれの事か!?
Entry.EnglishText: Dumb little brother... ...Wait, is that supposed to be me!?

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、俺の計略に まんまと乗ってくるとはな。
Entry.EnglishText: Hah, it looks like you played right into my hands.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんの事だ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺らにゃフォルスはない。 だが、自分に力がなけりゃ 道具で補えばいい。
Entry.EnglishText: We can't use Force. However, what we lack in powers, we make up for with tools.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人は道具を使うんだ。 時には人だって道具になる…… なあ、<Tytree>？
Entry.EnglishText: People have always used tools. In fact, sometimes people can even become tools themselves. Ain't that right, <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、おまえ…… まさか本当に、料理に あのビンの毒を……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, don't tell me... You didn't actually put that bottle of poison in our food, did you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 毒だって？
Entry.EnglishText: Poison?

Entry.JapaneseText: もしかしてあの時、 <Tytree>さんの持ってた ビンって……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, the bottle you had earlier, didn't you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>も、何か見たの？
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>, did you see something?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……でも……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes...but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……くっくっくっ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehe...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>さん？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: はーっはっはっはっはっは!! わははははははは……
Entry.EnglishText: Haaahahahahaha! AHAHAHAHAHA!!

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: No way...!

Entry.JapaneseText: うふっ……うふふふふふ……
Entry.EnglishText: He...Hehehehe...

Entry.JapaneseText: あははっ……あはあはあは……
Entry.EnglishText: Ahaha... Ahahahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: わはははははははは……
Entry.EnglishText: Wahahahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬふっ……ぬふふふふ……
Entry.EnglishText: Mhm...hmhmhmhm...

Entry.JapaneseText: ククク……毒が頭にまで 回ってきたようだな。 よくやったぞ、<Tytree>!! おまえは天才料理人だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehe... Looks like the poison has already gone to your heads. Well done, <Tytree>! You make a fine chef.

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う……おれは……!! ひーっひひひひひ…… はーっははは……
Entry.EnglishText: No... I...! Heeehehehehe... Ahahahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: さて、と……<Blue>王の盾<White>に ずいぶんと頂いちまったし、 仕事はきっちりしないとな。
Entry.EnglishText: Now then. The <Blue>Royal Shield<White> paid us handsomely, so we're gonna make sure we finish the job.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだと？ 金が目的か？
Entry.EnglishText: What? You're doing this for money?

Entry.JapaneseText: それだけじゃないさ、 俺らは能力者って奴が 大っ嫌いでね！
Entry.EnglishText: Not just for the money. We hate Force users!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>も能力者の 集団だぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: But the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> is full of Force users, too!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうさ、あのバカどもからも たんまりと巻き上げてやったぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: That's right, and we scammed those idiots out of a good deal of money!

Entry.JapaneseText: ひとり、毒の回ってない 頑丈なのがいるようだが、 一気にたたみかけちまえ！
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like there's a strong one who wasn't affected by the poison, but we'll make quick work of them!

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るぞ!! みんな、しっかりしろ！
Entry.EnglishText: They're going to attack! Everyone, get it together!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……やったか。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, that's that.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……毒も収まったようだ。 さて、説明してくれるか、 <Tytree>？
Entry.EnglishText: ...The poison seems to have worn off, as well. Care to explain yourself, <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おれを疑ってんのか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...You doubt me?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレは、おまえがあいつから 毒の入ったビンを受け取るのを見た。
Entry.EnglishText: I saw you take the bottle of poison from those guys.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、おまえが、本当に あれを料理に入れたとは…… 思いたくない。
Entry.EnglishText: But I didn't want to think that you'd really go through with it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かにおれはビンは受け取った。 でもな、おれは絶対にやってねぇ！ 仲間に毒を盛るくらいなら自分で毒を飲む。 それがおれの生き方だ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's true that I took the poison from him, but I would never actually use it! I'd poison myself before I poisoned my friends. That's how I roll!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、<Annie>も<Tytree>が ビンを持っていたのを見たって 言ってたじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: But didn't <Annie> say she saw you carrying the bottle, too?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>さんは、 それをすぐに捨てていたの。
Entry.EnglishText: He threw it away immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきはそれを言おうとしたら、 急に<Tytree>さんが 笑い出したから……
Entry.EnglishText: That's what I wanted to say earlier, but then <Tytree> started laughing...

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、そういう事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, pretty much.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあさ、 さっきのは一体……
Entry.EnglishText: Then what in the world just happened...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたし、思ったんですけど、 あの感じって、毒キノコを食べた時の 中毒症状に似てる気がするんです。
Entry.EnglishText: I was wondering the same thing, but I believe our symptoms were very similar to those you get after consuming poisonous mushrooms.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだって……？ しかし、このあたりに 生えている毒キノコといえば……
Entry.EnglishText: What...? But the only poisonous mushrooms growing around here...

Entry.JapaneseText: このバクショウダケくらいだが……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Would be the "Funny Fungus."

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、バクショウダケって いうのはこっちの……
Entry.EnglishText: No, the "Funny Fungus" is this one over here...

Entry.JapaneseText: これじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: These ones, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: それはアカダマダケといって、 香りが良く、味も食感もいい キノコだ。
Entry.EnglishText: That's the "Amber Jewel," a mushroom with a pleasant fragrance and an exquisite taste and texture.

Entry.JapaneseText: それじゃあ、さっきの料理の中に このバクショウダケが大量に……？
Entry.EnglishText: So then, that means our meal earlier contained large quantities of Funny Fungus...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>ー!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 真相が見えたようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: So the truth comes out.

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う、わざとじゃない!! ちょっとしたカン違いなんだ！ 許してください!! このとおり!!
Entry.EnglishText: No, I didn't mean to! I just made a little mistake, that's all! Please forgive me, I'm begging you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 許してあげるヨ、<Tytree>。 ボクたち心が広いからネ。
Entry.EnglishText: We forgive you, <Tytree>. We are such benevolent souls, after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな無事だったんですから、 そんなに謝らなくても……
Entry.EnglishText: No one was hurt, so you don't need to apologize that much...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……大事に 至らなくてよかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... I'm just glad nothing bad happened.

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じ過ちを繰り返さなければいい。 これでこの件は終わりだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Just don't make the same mistake again. And with that, this matter is resolved.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう!! ありがとう!! 男<Tytree>、この恩は忘れない。 次からは絶対に間違えないぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you! Thank you!! I, <Tytree>, swear on my honor as a man I'll never forget your kindness. I'll make sure to get it right next time!

Entry.JapaneseText: うん!! じゃあ戻ろうか。 ……って次!? また作るつもりなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Okay! Let's head on back... Wait, "next time!?" You plan on cooking for us again!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫だって！ 失敗は成功のもとって言うだろ？ 次はサイコウのごちそうを作るぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, don't sweat it! Failure is just a rehearsal for success, right? Next time, I'll make you a meal fit for a king!

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: うぉっと!? 何者だ、おっさん！
Entry.EnglishText: What the!? Just who the hell are you!?

Entry.JapaneseText: シッ!! 声がでかい。
Entry.EnglishText: Shh! Keep your voice down.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえが<Tytree>だな？
Entry.EnglishText: You're <Tytree>, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんでおれの名前を 知ってるんだよ？
Entry.EnglishText: H-How do you know my name?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな事はどうでもいい、よく聞け。 この毒を仲間に飲ませろ。 そうすれば、おまえの大事な 姉ちゃんを返してやる。
Entry.EnglishText: That's not important. Just listen to me. Give this poison to your companions. If you do, then we'll hand over your precious sister.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴を!?
Entry.EnglishText: Selena!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 声がでかいと 言ってるだろうが!!
Entry.EnglishText: I told you to keep your voice down!

Entry.JapaneseText: チャンスは一度きりだ。 姉ちゃんを助けたかったら、 俺の言うとおりにしろ。
Entry.EnglishText: You only have one chance. If you want to save your sister, then I suggest you do as I say.

Entry.JapaneseText: 頼むぞ、相棒。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't let me down, partner.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴……
Entry.EnglishText: Selena...

Entry.JapaneseText: よお、成果はどうだ？ ごちそうの材料は 集まってるか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, how's it going? Have you collected some scrumptious ingredients?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……こんな感じだ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Here's what I found.

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、これはッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: O-Oh no...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした？
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした、じゃないぜ。 この白い水玉模様のは毒キノコだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: What ISN'T wrong!? Mushrooms with white polka-dots on them are poisonous!

Entry.JapaneseText: こいつは、バクショウダケだ。 食べたら最後、しばらくの間、 笑いが止まらないっていう ある意味、恐ろしい毒キノコだ。
Entry.EnglishText: These are "Funny Fungus." Like the name implies, you'll have uncontrollable fits of laughter for a good while if you eat them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……毒キノコ……
Entry.EnglishText: Poisonous mushrooms...

Entry.JapaneseText: おれが気づいてよかったよ。 こりゃ<Veigue>には星はやれないな。 ま、おれが採ってきた分があるから、 料理には困らないけどな。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank goodness I noticed! I can't even give you a single star for these. It's a good thing I picked some too, otherwise we'd be out of a meal.
Entry.Notes: lit. Since there's the ones that I picked, I won't have a problem cooking.

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、<Veigue>はおれと違って、 素人だからしょうがないけどな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I guess an amateur like you can't really help it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まいったな、コイツは星ひとつだ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Oh geez, I can only give you one star for these...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした？
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……この白い水玉模様のは バクショウダケっていう毒キノコだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well... These mushrooms with the white polka-dots are a poisonous fungus called the "Funny Fungus."

Entry.JapaneseText: バクショウダケ？
Entry.EnglishText: “Funny Fungus?”

Entry.JapaneseText: 食べたら最後、しばらくの間、 笑いが止まらないっていう ある意味、恐ろしいキノコなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Like the name implies, you'll have uncontrollable fits of laughter for a good while after you eat it.

Entry.JapaneseText: かろうじて こっちの赤いキノコは食べられる。 おれが採ってきたのもあるから、 それと合わせりゃ、数は足りるかな。
Entry.EnglishText: All we can eat are the red ones. I collected some too, so if we add those to mine, we should have enough for a meal.

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、おれが腕によりをかけた スペシャルキノコメニューを ごちそうしてやるぜ！ 楽しみにしてろよ！
Entry.EnglishText: All right! I'm gonna go all-out and treat you to my "Special Deluxe Mushroom" menu! I hope you're excited!

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん、残念だが、 この白い水玉模様のは毒キノコだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm, sorry, but these mushrooms with the white polka-dots are poisonous.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうなのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that so?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、こいつはバクショウダケだ。 食べたら最後、しばらくの間、 笑いが止まらないっていう ある意味、恐ろしい毒キノコだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, these are poisonous mushrooms called the "Funny Fungus." Like the name implies, you'll have uncontrollable fits of laughter for a good while if you eat them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、こっちの赤いのは 食えるヤツだしな。 三つ星の出来ってとこかな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, these red ones are good to eat. I'd give your performance about three stars.

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、おれが腕によりをかけた スペシャルキノコメニューを ごちそうしてやるぜ！ 楽しみにしてろよ！
Entry.EnglishText: All right! I'm gonna go all-out and treat you to my "Special Deluxe Mushroom" menu! I hope you're excited!

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、いいねぇ!! 四つ星ってとこだな。 まだまだ、おれには及ばねえが、 <Veigue>にはキノコ狩りの才能がある！
Entry.EnglishText: Oho, pretty nice! That's a four-star ranking! You aren't at my level yet, but you've got a real knack for hunting mushrooms, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうなのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that so?

Entry.JapaneseText: この水玉模様のキノコが なけりゃ完ぺきだったんだけどな。
Entry.EnglishText: If this polka-dotted mushroom wasn't here, this bunch would've been perfect.

Entry.JapaneseText: こいつはバクショウダケっていう 食べたら最後、しばらくの間、 笑いが止まらない ある意味、恐ろしい毒キノコだ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is a poisonous mushroom called the "Funny Fungus." Like the name implies, you'll have uncontrollable fits of laughter for a good while if you eat it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、こいつは捨てて、と……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I'll just throw it away...

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、おれが腕によりをかけた スペシャルキノコメニューを ごちそうしてやるぜ！ 楽しみにしてろよ！
Entry.EnglishText: All right! I'm gonna go all-out and treat you to my "Special Deluxe Mushroom" menu! I hope you're excited!

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、すげえ!! 五つ星だぜ!! もしかして知ってたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Whoa, sweet! That's five stars right there! Don't tell me you knew?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんの事だ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: 全部、ちゃんと食べられる キノコじゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: About the mushrooms you picked. They're all edible!

Entry.JapaneseText: この辺りにはバクショウダケっていう 食べたら最後、しばらくの間、 笑いが止まらないある意味、恐ろしい 水玉模様の毒キノコがあるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a poisonous mushroom that grows around these parts called the "Funny Fungus." It's a mushroom with polka dots on it that if you eat it, you can't stop laughing.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうなのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that so?

Entry.JapaneseText: 知らなかったのか？ いや……もしかしたらおまえ、 キノコ狩りの天才だな？
Entry.EnglishText: You really didn't know? Wait... Could it be that you're a mushroom hunting genius!?

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、おれが腕によりをかけた スペシャルキノコメニューを ごちそうしてやるぜ！ 楽しみにしてろよ！
Entry.EnglishText: All right! I'm gonna go all-out and treat you to my "Special Deluxe Mushroom" menu! I hope you're excited!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうだ？ 木材は集まったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Well? Have you gathered any wood?

Entry.JapaneseText: これだけは集まったが……
Entry.EnglishText: This is all I could find...

Entry.JapaneseText: それだけあればいいだろう。 全員で集めた分があれば 舟を直すために充分な量になる。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure it will do. Combined with the rest that we gathered, this should be enough for the repairs.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ？ <Tytree>と<Annie>は？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? Where are <Annie> and <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は拾ったキノコを持って 食事の準備をしに行ったみたいだ。 <Annie>は……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree> went to prepare food with the mushrooms we picked. As for <Annie>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、そっちはどう？
Entry.EnglishText: How'd you do, <Annie>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 木材は集まりました。 それより……なんだか <Tytree>さんの様子が おかしかったんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I've gathered some wood, but I noticed <Tytree> was acting somewhat funny...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>がおかしいのは、 いつもの事でしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't he always kinda funny?

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう意味じゃなくって……
Entry.EnglishText: Not in that sense...

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく今は集めた木材を ググラさんのところへ 持っていこう。
Entry.EnglishText: At any rate, Gugura is waiting for us. Let's deliver the wood.

Entry.JapaneseText: おーい、どこへ行くんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! Where are you going?

Entry.JapaneseText: おーい、どこへ行くんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! Where are you going?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 森の奥には行かない方がいい。
Entry.EnglishText: We don't need to go further in the woods.
